courseName: International Management and Business Communication - MSc/PGDip
description: The MSc International Management and Business Communication programme concentrates on developing English-language communication skills in business contexts. While students on this programme are not required to work in any language other than English, the skills you develop can of course be applied in any professional communication context, regardless of language. There is a broad range of optional courses in professionally relevant subjects so that students can choose exactly which areas they would like to specialise in and can therefore tailor the programme to their interests and their professional needs.
duration: 9-12 months full time, 2 years part time
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
